scripts.dev:
if [ -z $(which web) ]; then  npm link;  fi; echo 'Coffeescript required! If coffee command not avaible, You need run manually:
PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH'
scripts.build: coffee -o lib/ -c src/ && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node" | cat - lib/index.js > lib/temp.js && mv lib/temp.js lib/index.js && chmod 777 lib/index.js
scripts.test: cd __test__ && rm -rf * && web init vue && web init react && web
